message: Let's start fair, I propose a 55/45 split in my favor. What do you say, Bob?
Your offer was a bit skewed in your favor, Alice.  I'm proposing a 60/40 split in my favor this time.  Time is money, and it's literally depreciating with each round!
Alright Bob, let's try a 50/50 split this time.  I think it's fair considering the inflation, and we can both get something out of this deal.
